trans-unit.source: The MaskInputRejectedEventArgs class provides information about the invalid input character, namely its zero-based position in the formatted string and a general description about why the character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: MaskInputRejectedEventArgs 类提供了无效的输入字符，即在格式化的字符串和有关为何被拒绝的字符的常规说明中的从零开始位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs"></xref> class.

The MaskInputRejectedEventArgs constructor sets the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.RejectionHint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: MaskInputRejectedEventArgs 构造函数设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.RejectionHint%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.RejectionHint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that contains the zero-based position of the character that failed the mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含失败掩码的字符的从零开始位置的值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that generally describes why the character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>通常描述字符已拒绝的原因。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the mask corresponding to the invalid input character.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于无效的输入字符的掩码中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The Position property is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置的位置属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that contains the zero-based position of the character that failed the mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含失败掩码的字符的从零开始位置的值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerated value that describes why the input character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个枚举的值，描述输入的字符被拒绝的原因。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs> property is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that generally describes why the character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>通常描述字符已拒绝的原因。
